metadata.title: <document title in english>
metadata.acronym: <acronym of the organization/institution/owner of the document>
metadata.short_description: <brief description - if not found generate one and start with '* '>
metadata.abstract: <document abstract - if not found generate one and start with '* '>
metadata.summary: <document summary - if not found generate one and start with '* '>
metadata.start_date: <policy start date in year format - if document refers to a policy>
metadata.end_date: <policy end date in year format - if document refers to a policy>
metadata.language: <ISO 639 language of the most prevalent text - use language detection to set this value>

authors.name: <author full name>
authors.orcid: <ORCID of the author - if an ORCID exists (ORCID format: https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX)>

links.name: <linked document name>
links.pid: <persistent identifier of linked document - if a persistent identifier can be found>
links.type: <link type: e.g. doi/handle(when pid found), link>

tags: <tags of document: values among ['national policy', 'university policy', 'use cases', 'strategy', 'RPO policy', 'RFO policy', 'survey', 'survey results'>
other_tags: <list of 3-7 relevant tags based on document content>
